website_summaries.verdict: The small size of this catcher’s glove is perfect for young players just learning the position.
pros: Nicely priced glove for a beginner
Lightweight design means kids won’t become frustrated while also wearing heavy catcher’s gear
Glove secures to the hand with adjustable strap near the wrist
cons: At 31.5 inches, it may be too small or tight for some youth players

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 7yr old average sized son. It was pretty stiff from the package, and he wasn't able to squeeze the ball right away. However, I took it asked my 14yr old to play catch with me, and throw HARD. In just a couple sessions of that, the glove has a great feel and is probably the best glove you can get for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Spend a bit more for a better quality mitt.
customer_reviews.text: It’s just ok. I bought the 31.5” for my 9-10 year old baseball team to use; however, it seems to run small. This glove in that size is probably best for 6-8 year olds. Spend a bit more and get the Wilson 500, and get it in a light color rather than the leftover scrap stuff they make the black one out of.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT youth catchers mitt
customer_reviews.text: It can be a little stiff, but if you take time to break it in you'll be good. Great value for my 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Lance M.

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for youth catcher
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this glove. It's the perfect fit and just right for the youth player
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer ~ Book Starlets

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Hand hole was super tight for 8 year old. Had to cram hand in and couldn’t budge it closed. I get you have to break them in and we have three other Wilson regular gloves but we sent this back. Bought another youth mitt for about $10 more and it’s infinitely better.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Good glove, the kids on the team seemed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good glove, the kids on the team seemed to like it and some actually did rather well using it. I kinda wish I good give it 4.5 stars but its tough to rate as I am not a user of the glove. My son loved it so much so he would like to catch full time next season, note he is six.
customer_reviews.author: Walter R. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break in and formed well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 10u little league team. Easy to break in and formed well. Didn't want to spend a lot on a nicer glove for the kids to learn the basics and grow out of it. I love Wilson gloves and it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: needs breaking in
customer_reviews.text: it seemed a good servciable glove but it was very stiff and needed a lot of breaking in. We opted to get another model used as my son lost his and we needed one in season.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Price

customer_reviews.title: It's a glove for a couple years until he out grows it
customer_reviews.text: Glove was ready right out of the box. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: flyerjuls

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The glove is very well made and fits my 7 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: David bond

customer_reviews.title: baseball
customer_reviews.text: glove is stiff no matter what I do to try to break it in it's been 3 months and it's still hard to close
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Effner

customer_reviews.title: Great mitt
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mitt for our 11yo trying out a new position on his little league team.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The catchers mitt was gift for my granddaughter. She likes it so we are good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stiff but it works
customer_reviews.text: I got this glove for my son and he loves it! One problem it’s pretty stiff and kind of hard to break in all though every thing else is great!
customer_reviews.author: Katy D.

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: The glove pocket size is vary small compared to other brands of the same size
customer_reviews.author: cripe427

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is loving his glove and will use it again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Na
customer_reviews.text: The leather. Is poor quality and the pocket was too small
customer_reviews.author: ea123

customer_reviews.title: Padding very thin
customer_reviews.text: The glove is made well except the padding is very thin and the lace is horrible
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to break in and even harder for kids to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very hard glove. Not easy to break in and even harder for kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: My young son had a terrible time catching
customer_reviews.text: The glove had no pocket for the ball to go. My young son had a terrible time catching. The ball even popped out of the mitt for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ammon

customer_reviews.title: Great service for a mitt
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful service great mitt. Grandson says it is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen K. Evanchalk

customer_reviews.title: Webbing failed after one season.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11 year old son. He used it for one season. Today, on the first day of his second season of use the webbing completely failed. If you can tell from the picture three different straps snapped. We paid enough for this thing to expect more than a single season of use. Won’t buy Wilson again.
customer_reviews.author: HighlandsHome

product_meta.title: Wilson A360 31.5" Youth Baseball Catcher’s Mitt (Right Hand Throw)
product_meta.description: The 31.5in A360 Catchers Mitt is a great introduction mitt for young players with a lightweight and flexible construction. Its 31.5" size allows young catchers to have quicker hands behind the plate. This glove features a full pigskin palm and web, as well as a hook and loop strap to make the glove feel secure on your hand through the game. Also features a 1/2 Moon Web.
feature_bullets: 31.5", Right Hand Throw (glove worn on left hand)
